column3: This is a requirement in case we want to support RPC interruption due to connection close. For instance, currently interrupting the command `bitcoin-cli -regtest waitfornewblock` doesn't interrupt the server handling.\n\nThis is also relevant for long calls, especially `scantxoutset`.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->
